title: Miley Cyrus Puts Kaitlynn Carter In 'Rear' View With New Sexy Snap
text:
Miley Cyrus is moving on and leaving her ex-girlfriend, Kaitlynn Carter, in the dust.

The "Mother's Daughter" singer shared some sexy, but telling, photos from her vacation with her mom and sister on Thursday, and she seemingly references moving on from her most recent relationship.

Related:

Kaitlynn Carter Drops Hint That She's Moving On After Breakup With Miley Cyrus

Miley Cyrus Rocks the Stage After Breakup With Kaitlynn Carter

Miley Cyrus and Kaitlynn Carter Break-Up After Only A Month Together

Miley Cyrus Leaves Kaitlynn Carter 'Drooling' With Sizzling Snap

Miley Cyrus' 'Slide Away' Music Video is Here 1-Month After Liam Hemsworth Split

Exposing her rear in a black thong bikini, Miley snapped her assets from behind and threw her hands in the air.

"Goodbyes are never easy," she wrote, "but g2g."

Miley looks better than she's ever been, and with two breakups under her belt this summer, she's clearly ready to say thank you, next.

That's not the only sexy snap the singer shared from her "necessary" getaway, or the only shot she seemingly took at an ex.

Posting revealing pics showing her soaking up the last of the summer sun, the long limbed beauty appeared to take aim at her estranged husband, Liam Hemsworth.

"I’m more of a man than you’ll ever be, & more of a woman than you’ll ever get!” she wrote, quoting the late composer, Jonathan Larson.

View photos

As The Blast reported, Miley and Liam revealed they had separated last month after less than a year of marriage.

She quickly moved on to Kaitlynn and Liam filed for divorce shortly after.

Miley and Kaitlynn had a wild ride over the summer, but all good flings must come to an end.

View photos

The singer revealed she had split with the reality star over the weekend.

As we reported, Miley and her hunky ex-husband are on track to wrap up their divorce by the end of October.

She's clearly ready to move forward and we can't wait to see what's next for the star!
